Title: Access Legacy Internet Explorer in Windows 11
Description: ![]() Did you know that the legacy Internet Explorer still exists in Windows 11? Microsoft shipped Windows 11 series with Internet Explorer being disabled, and let me show you on how to access it. Microsoft stopped supporting the Internet Explorer web browser, indicating the end is near for a 26-year-old brand with baggage that includes an antitrust case, security flaws and lagging performance. The legacy IE will be discontinued by mid-2022.
